head.title: Naomi Ishido and Gregory J. Lipper

hedline.hl1: Naomi Ishido and Gregory J. Lipper

block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Tadashi Ishido of Tokyo have announced the engagement of their daughter Naomi Ishido to Gregory Jensen Lipper, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Lipper 3d of White Plains. A September wedding is planned.

Ms. Ishido, 27 years old, is a ground attendant for Cathay Pacific Airways in Tokyo. She graduated from Gadsden State Junior College. Her father is a real-estate investor in Tokyo. Her mother, Hideko Ishido, manages the family's dry-cleaning business there.

Mr. and Mrs. Tadashi Ishido of Tokyo have announced the engagement of their daughter Naomi Ishido to Gregory Jensen Lipper, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Lipper 3d of White Plains. A September wedding is planned.

Ms. Ishido, 27 years old, is a ground attendant for Cathay Pacific Airways in Tokyo. She graduated from Gadsden State Junior College. Her father is a real-estate investor in Tokyo. Her mother, Hideko Ishido, manages the family's dry-cleaning business there.
Mr. Lipper, 25, is a manager for new business development for Mitsubishi International Corporation in Atlanta. He graduated from Babson College. His father is a venture investment banker in New York.
